uk.thecodingbadgers.minekart.lobby

Class LobbySign

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.thecodingbadgers.minekart.lobby.LobbySign

  • public class LobbySign
extends Object
    Author:
    TheCodingBadgers Represents a MineKart game join sign.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LobbySign()
      Instantiates a new lobby sign, with no information.
      LobbySign(Block location, Racecourse course)
      Instantiates a new lobby sign, with the given information.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroy this sign, removing all data on this sign in memory and on disk.
      Block getBlock()
      Gets the block this join sign is occupying.
      Racecourse getCourse()
      Gets the course that this join sign is linked to.
      Sign getSign()
      Gets the sign state for this join sign.
      String[] getSignContent()
      Gets the sign current desired content.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Gets whether this sign is currently enabled, no logic will be performed on this sign until it is enabled.
      boolean load(File file, FileConfiguration config)
      Load the information into the sign.
      void save(File file, FileConfiguration config)
      Save the information for the sign.
      void update()
      Update the sign with the latest information.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LobbySign

        public LobbySign(Block location,
         Racecourse course)
        Instantiates a new lobby sign, with the given information.
        Parameters:
        location - the sign block for the join sign
        course - the racecourse for this sign to be linked to

      • LobbySign

        public LobbySign()
        Instantiates a new lobby sign, with no information.

        Please note, this sign will not work until you have loaded the data from a sign config file

        See Also:
        load(File, FileConfiguration)

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public boolean load(File file,
           FileConfiguration config)
        Load the information into the sign.
        Parameters:
        config - the config file for the sign
        Returns:
        true, if loaded successfully

        FileConfiguration config)
        Save the information for the sign.
        Parameters:
        config - the config file for the sign

      • update

        public void update()
        Update the sign with the latest information.

        public String[] getSignContent()
        Gets the sign current desired content.
        Returns:
        the sign content

      • getSign

        public Sign getSign()
        Gets the sign state for this join sign.
        Returns:
        the sign, or null if the specified block is not a sign

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock()
        Gets the block this join sign is occupying.

      • getCourse

        public Racecourse getCourse()
        Gets the course that this join sign is linked to.
        Returns:
        the course that this join sign is linked to

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Gets whether this sign is currently enabled, no logic will be performed on this sign until it is enabled.
        Returns:
        true, if the sign is enabled, false othewise

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroy this sign, removing all data on this sign in memory and on disk.
